- River, Carmel fires have been 100% contained 
- LNU Complex: 375,209 acres, 88% contained 
- SCU Complex: 396,624 acres, 84% contained
- CZU Complex: 86,509 acres, 58% contained 

See the latest on our Fire Tracker: https://t.co/N3gP86HiOH
